name: Let's Get Happy Ending Project Chapter 2 Viola's Second Chance
name_original: Let's Get Happy Ending Project Chapter 2 Viola's Second Chance
description: Second chapter of mostly indie games project is here, do you felt the sorrow and regret after finishing Witch's House on True End? Do you ever wished to save Viola from her cruel fate? In this game you have this possibility, that's right, Viola returned but she still trapped in Ellen's body, fortunately for her, kind girl got more proper body, now she need to return in resurrected cursed house and make Ellen give back her body and her happy life, help her with it, like first chapter this game have a three endings, Normal, Bad and True aka Good, can you bring Viola to her Happy Ending? Her fate in your hands.
